channel.title: Method60/Class9
channel.description: Has anyone figured out what designates the location on the screen where interfaces/windows are drawn. Referring to interfaces strictly drawn in the middle of the play screen. Not over the sidetab or the chatbox. What sets the x,y coordinates for the drawing.

item.title: Method60/Class9
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

Has anyone figured out what designates the location on the screen where interfaces/windows are drawn. Referring to interfaces strictly drawn in the middle of the play screen. Not over the sidetab or the chatbox. What sets the x,y coordinates for the drawing.
